text: Tender Is the Night is a 1964 album by Johnny Mathis. It was released on 23 January, 1964 through Mercury Records and went to number 13 in the United States. ==Track listing== ===Side one=== #"Tender Is the Night" from Tender Is the Night (Sammy Fain, Paul Francis Webster) - 3:44 #"Laura" from Laura (David Raksin, Johnny Mercer) - 4:38 #"No Strings" from No Strings (Richard Rodgers) - 3:13 #"I Can't Give You Anything But Love" from Blackbirds of 1928 (Jimmy McHugh, Dorothy Fields) - 2:46 #"April Love" from April Love (Sammy Fain, Paul Francis Webster)- 2:58 #"Call Me Irresponsible" from Papa's Delicate Condition (Sammy Cahn, Jimmy Van Heusen) - 3:42 ===Side two=== #"A Dream Is a Wish Your Heart Makes" from Cinderella (Mack David, Al Hoffman, Jerry Livingston) - 3:01 #"A Ship Without a Sail" from Head's Up! (Richard Rodgers, Lorenz Hart) - 4:08 #"Forget Me Not" (Bart Howard) - 2:33 #"Where Is Love?" from Oliver! (Lionel Bart) - 2:26 #"Somewhere" from West Side Story (Leonard Bernstein, Stephen Sondheim) - 4:32 #"Tomorrow Song" (Bart Howard)- 3:06 ==References== Category:1964 albums Category:Johnny Mathis albums Category:Mercury Records albums
title: Tender Is the Night (Johnny Mathis album)
